fpmExplorer:Page.title: Custom Column
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Table building block enables you to render custom columns in a table.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Add Custom Columns
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can add custom columns to your table. In this example, a process flow is added as a custom column. By specifying property names in the 'properties' attribute of the column, users can sort, group, export, and paste data based on these properties.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Add Columns through Manifest
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: If you want to add custom columns to your object page table rendered through UI.Facet annotations, you can use the 'columns' property in the controlConfiguration section of the respective UI.LineItem.
